headline: Nuclear Company Reports Earnings Fresh Off Regulators Rejecting Amazon Deal
summary: Talen Energy reports third-quarter earnings and revenue early Thursday, giving investors a chance to hear from the company after federal regulators recently rejected a $650 million nuclear deal between Talen and Amazon.com.  Analysts expect the Houston-based Talen Energy to report Q3 EPS of 26 cents, up from a $1.30 loss a year ago, with revenue increasing 1% to $522 million.  Along with Talen Energy, Oklo — the nuclear power startup backed by OpenAI head Sam Altman — announces third-quarter earnings after the market closes Thursday.

headline: These are the S&P 500's top 3 performing stocks in 2024
summary: As part of today's Chart of the Day, Yahoo Finance anchor Madison Mills examines the top-performing stocks in the S&P 500 (^GSPC) so far this year. The standout performers highlighted include Palantir Technologies (PLTR), Nvidia (NVDA), and Vistra Corp (VST). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: Is Most-Watched Stock Vistra Corp. (VST) Worth Betting on Now?
summary: Vistra (VST) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
